report.title: Overviews - sample details
report.description: A report to display the sample information on various sample details pages.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM samples s JOIN surveys su on su.id=s.survey_id and su.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l on l.id = s.location_id AND l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_occurrences_functional o on o.sample_id = s.id and o.survey_id=su.id and o.website_id=su.website_id LEFT JOIN taxa_taxon_list_attribute_values ttlav on ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_id=o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id and ttlav.deleted=false and ttlav.taxa_taxon_list_attribute_id in (#all_trait_attr_ids#) WHERE s.id = #sample_id# and '#sample_type#' = 'sample' AND #website_filter#

param.name: sample_id
param.description: Sample id to retrieve data for.

param.name: all_trait_attr_ids
param.description: Comma separated list of the taxa taxon list attribute ids that hold species traits.

column.name: duplicates
column.sql: case when count(distinct o.id)=count(distinct o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id) then '' else ' (' || (count(distinct o.id)-count(distinct o.preferred_taxa_taxon_list_id))::varchar || ' duplicates)' end
